&reftitle.parameters;
time
String in a format accepted by strtotime.
timezone
Time zone of the time. If $timezone is omitted, the current timezone will be used. The $timezone parameter will be ignored if a timezone is specified in the $time parameter (e.g. using 2010-01-28T15:00:00+02:00).

&reftitle.errors;
Emits Exception in case of an error.
